comment._content: The Chief  Minister, Mr ("Mwalimu") Julius Nyerere, addressing the Constitutional Conference in the Karimjee Hall, Dar es Salaam, probably on the opening day, 27 March 1961. On his right hand side (on left in picture) is Mr Roland Brown, Legal Adviser; next to him is Mr Oscar Kambona, Minister for Education; next is Mr Derek Bryceson, Minister for Health and Labour; on his right at the side of the table is Mr Amir Jamal, Minister for Communications, Power and Works; then other elected ministers and TANU representatives. On the right hand side of the table the three figures are Mr J S R Cole, QC, Attorney General; HE Sir Richard Turnbull, Governor of Tanganyika; and Mr John Fletcher-Cooke, Deputy Governor. With backs to the camera are members of the British Colonial Office team accompanying the Secretary of State, Mr Iain Macleod, MP.
